message: I think a 60/40 split is a fair starting point, Bob.  What do you think?
I think we can meet somewhere in the middle, 55/45 is a good compromise.
Bob, let's be realistic.  This is the last round where my offer is worth more than yours was last round.  I'll do 58/42.
I'm willing to take a bigger share due to inflation, 57/43 is my final offer.
